abstract: Quarterly profit increased 38 percent, to $145 million, on improving margins in its core retail business and increased sales.
snippet: Quarterly profit increased 38 percent, to $145 million, on improving margins in its core retail business and increased sales.
lead_paragraph: The typically slow winter months for traditional retailers did not seem to put a chill on the shopping at Amazon.com.

headline.main: Both Sales and Earnings Rise Sharply at Amazon
headline.print_headline: Both Sales And Earnings Rise Sharply At Amazon
